snippet: One game after their worst home loss in 40 years, the No. 19 Hoyas beat the Red Storm, 67-51, at Madison Square Garden.
abstract: College Basketball East Men's Roundup; Georgetown defeats St John's, 67-51; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: One game after their worst home loss in 40 years, the No. 19 Hoyas beat the Red Storm, 67-51, at Madison Square Garden.

headline.seo: Georgetown Responds to Humbling Defeat by Routing St. John’s
headline.main: Georgetown Responds to Humbling Defeat by Routing St. John’s
headline.print_headline: Georgetown Responds to Humbling Defeat by Routing St. John’s
